name: ElasticComputeCloudSpotFleetSpotFleetRequestConfigDataLaunchSpecificationsNetworkInterfaces
description: NetworkInterfaces is a property of the Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud SpotFleet SpotFleetRequestConfigData LaunchSpecifications property that defines the network interface of the instances.

properties.name: AssociatePublicIpAddress
properties.description: Indicates whether monitoring is enabled for the instances.

properties.name: DeleteOnTermination
properties.description: Indicates whether to delete the network interface when the instance terminates.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: The description of this network interface.

properties.name: DeviceIndex
properties.description: The network interface's position in the attachment order.

properties.name: Groups
properties.description: A list of security group IDs to associate with this network interface.

properties.name: PrivateIpAddresses
properties.description: One or more private IP addresses to assign to the network interface. You can designate only one private IP address as primary.

properties.name: SecondaryPrivateIpAddressCount
properties.description: The number of secondary private IP addresses that Amazon Elastic Compute Cloud (Amazon EC2) automatically assigns to the network interface.

properties.name: SubnetId
properties.description: The ID of the subnet to associate with the network interface.
